title: Topic 001 Question 079
body: You have a Fabric workspace named Workspace1 and an Azure SQL database.
You plan to create a dataflow that will read data from the database, and then transform the data by performing an inner join.
You need to ignore spaces in the values when performing the inner join. The solution must minimize development effort.
options: Append the queries by using fuzzy matching.
Merge the queries by using fuzzy matching.
Append the queries by using a lookup table.
Merge the queries by using a lookup table.
